授業目的: This course seeks to understand the history of postwar Japan on politics, diplomacy, economy, society, and culture. Based on this lecture, we will discuss a story of postwar Japanese history.
到達目標: The learning goal of this class is to ①understanding the history of postwar Japan on politics, and explain the history, and discuss each other.
授業方法:
Combination of lectures and discussion.
This class conducted interactively.
For this class, students are required to read reference books and download materials: PowerPoint slide.
Before the class, until July 20th, the teacher uploads the detail of this class.
This class conducts face-to-face in a designated classroom.
The interactive class will be delivered simultaneously online for students who have applied for online class participation.
For those students who were not able to participate in the live Zoom sessions, the instructor will provide on-demand material and a task for that student.
